named-native-query.name: Schedule.findByGroupId
named-native-query.query: SELECT * FROM schedule s inner join group_schedule gs on s.id = gs.schedule_id inner join "group" on gs.group_id = "group".id inner join educational_program ep on ep.id = "group".educational_program_id inner join university u on u.id = ep.university_id WHERE gs.group_id = :groupId and u.id = :universityId

named-native-query.name: Schedule.countByGroupId
named-native-query.query: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM schedule s inner join group_schedule gs on s.id = gs.schedule_id inner join "group" on gs.group_id = "group".id inner join educational_program ep on ep.id = "group".educational_program_id inner join university u on u.id = ep.university_id WHERE gs.group_id = :groupId and u.id = :universityId
